name: New World Hotel
address: 11/183 Dang Tien Dong, Dong Da District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
When visiting Hanoi, you'll feel right at home at New World Hotel, which offers quality accommodation and great service. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

New World Hotel offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. The hotel offers access to a vast array of services, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service, airport transfer.

In addition, all guestrooms feature a variety of comforts. Many rooms even provide mirror, towels, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), mini bar to please the most discerning guest. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. New World Hotel is a smart choice for travelers to Hanoi, offering a relaxed and hassle-free stay every time.
